descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][/size][/b][/center][center][b][size=5]WORK IN PROGRESS (VERSION 1)

[/size][/b] Hunhofkun (Literally Hero Home) is a growing player-home mod, and is open to suggestions. The tower is located East of Windhelm, and is currently completely vacant. The tower's interior is 3 floors, with a large basement intended to be a work area. The plaza features a mysterious statue with the ability to call dragons. (Dragons level with the player)

This mod is very much a work in progress, and features little aside from the dragon spawner. Suggestions and support, however, would be greatly appreciated.[/center] [center][/center]
author: Falcarious
